  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player​(GameBoard board, int nbCards)
      Constructs and initializes a player with a gameboard and a number of cards
      Parameters:
      board - the gameboard on which we put all the cards and coins
      nbCards - the number of cards per player

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public void draw​(Card card, int index)
      Draws and adds a card to the player's hand
      Parameters:
      card - the drawn card
      index - the index of the former card in order to put the new card at the same place

    • play

      public Card play​(int index)
      Plays and removes a card of the player's hand
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the card to play and to remove of the player's hand
      Returns:
      The card to play and to remove of the player's hand
